    • Constructor Detail

      • CameraManager

        public CameraManager​(int rightShift,
                     int leftShift,
                     int bottomShift,
                     int topShift,
                     greenfoot.Actor focus,
                     greenfoot.World world,
                     Tile[][] wholeWorld,
                     int startX,
                     int startY)
        creates an instance of a CameraManager for a world --> also keeps track of whats in the world
        Parameters:
        rightShift - position on the right of the screen before screen starts scrolling
        leftShift - position on the left of the screen before screen starts scrolling
        bottomShift - position on the bottom of the screen before screen starts scrolling
        topShift - position on the top of the screen before screen starts scrolling
        focus - the actor that the camera moves around
        world - the world at which the scrolling takes place
        wholeWorld - the larger world in which the screen is only a small part of
        realX - the x coordinate in the whole world

    • Method Detail

      • updateCurrentScreen

        public void updateCurrentScreen()
        shifts the screen given the focus' position on the screen
